SEARCH
Package launcher.watchdog

Class EngineWatchdog

java.lang.Object
launcher.watchdog.EngineWatchdog
public class EngineWatchdog extends Object
Responsible for handling errors and unexpected behaviours and ensuring the EngineCore runs smoothly.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private CrashHandler
    crashHandler
    The current CrashHandler to be used when the current instance crashes upon a CrashReport being received by onExitReport(ExitReport).
    private static int
    exitAttempts
    Holds the number of times the watchdog has attempted to exit the current instance.

    If this exceeds MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS, the current instance is forcefully terminated.
    private ExitHandler
    exitHandler
    The current ExitHandler to be used when the current instance exits upon an ExitReport being received by onExitReport(ExitReport).
    private static ExitReport
    exitReport
    Null until an ExitReport is received by submitExitReport(ExitReport), which sets this value to the ExitReport received.

    This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in start(), and handle the ExitReport accordingly.
    private static IsAliveNotification
    lastAliveNotification
     
    private static Logger
    logger
    The Logger to be used by both the EngineWatchdog and EngineCore to record LogEntrys.
    private static final int
    MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS
    The maximum number of times the watchdog is permitted to attempt to exit.

    Once exitAttempts exceeds this value, the program will be forcefully terminated.

    Closes the watchdog when the program is ready to terminate or restart

    private void
    onExitReport(ExitReport exitReport)
    Handles exiting of program when an ExitReport is submitted.

    Called by start() when exitReport becomes non-null, signifying the program wants to exit.

    Logs the ExitReport, and then calls either ExitHandler.onExit(ExitReport) on exitHandler, or CrashHandler.onCrash(CrashReport) on crashHandler, depending on the value of ExitReport.isClean(), to handle the report accordingly.
    void
    start()
    Starts the watchdog.

    Enters a while loop, calling update() repeatedly until an ExitReport is submitted to submitExitReport(ExitReport), and exitReport is no longer null.

    The watchdog will then attempt to handle the ExitReport by calling onExitReport(ExitReport).
    static void

    Sets the exitReport to the ExitReport passed in.

    This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in start(), to then handle the report accordingly.
    void
    update()
    Runs tasks to ensure the EngineCore is running as expected.

  • Field Details

    • exitAttempts

      private static int exitAttempts
      Holds the number of times the watchdog has attempted to exit the current instance.

      If this exceeds MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS, the current instance is forcefully terminated.

    • MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS

      private static final int MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS
      The maximum number of times the watchdog is permitted to attempt to exit.

      Once exitAttempts exceeds this value, the program will be forcefully terminated.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      private ExitHandler exitHandler
      The current ExitHandler to be used when the current instance exits upon an ExitReport being received by onExitReport(ExitReport).

    • crashHandler

      private CrashHandler crashHandler
      The current CrashHandler to be used when the current instance crashes upon a CrashReport being received by onExitReport(ExitReport).

    • exitReport

      private static ExitReport exitReport
      Null until an ExitReport is received by submitExitReport(ExitReport), which sets this value to the ExitReport received.

      This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in start(), and handle the ExitReport accordingly.

  • Constructor Details

    • EngineWatchdog

      public EngineWatchdog(LaunchConfig launchConfig)
      Instantiates the watchdog, creating the Logger and exitHandlers.
      Parameters:
      launchConfig - The LaunchConfig created by the Launcher upon first execution.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the watchdog.

      Enters a while loop, calling update() repeatedly until an ExitReport is submitted to submitExitReport(ExitReport), and exitReport is no longer null.

      The watchdog will then attempt to handle the ExitReport by calling onExitReport(ExitReport). If it encounters an exception, it will try to exit again, incrementing the value of exitAttempts until it exceeds the value of MAX_EXIT_ATTEMPTS, at which point the program will be forcefully terminated.

    • update

      public void update()
      Runs tasks to ensure the EngineCore is running as expected.

    • submitExitReport

      public static void submitExitReport(ExitReport exitReport)
      Sets the exitReport to the ExitReport passed in.

      This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in start(), to then handle the report accordingly.
      Parameters:
      exitReport - The ExitReport which exitReport should be set to.

    • onExitReport

      private void onExitReport(ExitReport exitReport)
      Handles exiting of program when an ExitReport is submitted.

      Called by start() when exitReport becomes non-null, signifying the program wants to exit.

      Logs the ExitReport, and then calls either ExitHandler.onExit(ExitReport) on exitHandler, or CrashHandler.onCrash(CrashReport) on crashHandler, depending on the value of ExitReport.isClean(), to handle the report accordingly.
      Parameters:
      exitReport -

    • getLogger

      public static Logger getLogger()

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the watchdog when the program is ready to terminate or restart
